speaker.whotheyare: Liz Fosslien uses behavioral science to make work better.
speaker.whylisten: Liz Fosslien is the Head of Content and Editorial at Humu, a company that uses behavioral science to make work better, and the coauthor and illustrator of the Wall Street Journal best-seller No Hard Feelings: The Secret Power of Embracing Emotions at Work. Her work has been featured by the New York Times, TIME magazine, The Economist and NPR.
